name: The Tail of Monkey James
description:
The Tail of Monkey James is a naughty interactive picture book for naughty children who watch R-rated movies despite their parents' wishes.

Play as Monkey James, a monkey on his way to his very important job only to be swept up into a much more interesting (and dangerous) adventure.

This game was originally made for ListJam2 on Newgrounds. Click here to see more submissions.
